tha-ap399:1.3: pitā matā bhātā → mātā pitā ca bhātā ca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap399:13.2: saṃ tacaṃ → santavaṃ (bj); santanuṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); saṃ tanuṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap399:15.2: girimañjariṃ → girimañjarimapūjayiṃ (bj); girimañjari pūjayiṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); girapañjaliṃ pūjayiṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap399:15.3: Dibbagandhaṃ sampavantaṃ → dibbagandhena sampannaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap399:21.2: atulopi → atulo ca (bj); atulopi (sya1ed, sya2ed); mahāsamuddo vākkhobbho atulo pi (pts-vp-pli1)
